pages.title: Keybinds
pages.text: $(thing)V$() — Push-to-talk (voice input to AI)$(br)$(thing)G$() — Whistle (call companion to you)$(br2)Whistle behavior:$(br)$(li)If >64 blocks away: instant teleport$(li)If 6-64 blocks: pathfinds to you$(li)If <6 blocks: no action needed

pages.title: HUD Overlay
pages.text: A persistent HUD panel in the $(bold)top-left$() corner shows:$(br2)$(li)Companion name$(li)Health bar (color-coded)$(li)Behavior mode badge$(li)Distance to companion$(li)Current task status$(br2)When holding a $(bold)Logistics Wand$(), an additional overlay in the $(bold)bottom-center$() shows the current wand mode and tagged block count.
